name: Maple-Roasted Tomatoes With Capers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 punnet sweet berry truss tomatoes, washed, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients, except the oil into a medium bowl and season well. Toss to coat and set aside for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Preheat oven to 140Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Arrange tomatoes onto tray, cut side-up. Drizzle over maple mixture. Cook for 11/2 hours or until semi-dried.
Cool, then transfer to sterilised jars. Cover with oil and seal with lid. Store in the fridge for up to 1 month. Use in antipasti, sauces, and on pizzas.
